fields.name: Annual Report Review
fields.description: These submissions are for your Regional Director(s) to review to confirm a balanced program and overAll health of your chapter.

fields.name: Annual Report Submission
fields.description: Final submission of the Annual Report

fields.name: Audit
fields.description: An audit is a checks and balances of the chapter's finances to make sure All moneys in and out are accounted for. It is recommended that a chapter do an audit of its finances at the end of every semester. The Treasurer should do this with at least one other individual such as another chapter officer, chapter adviser or alumni.

fields.name: Awards
fields.description:
The Awards Packet is submitted yearly and is made up of submission forms for multiple awards, such as but not limited to: Adviser Award of Excellence, Best Website, Best Newsletter, etc.
Winners are recognized yearly at the Leadership Academy and National Convention.

fields.name: Credentials
fields.description: This form is submitted to the Theta Tau Central Office to indicate your chapter's Delegate and Alternate for the upcoming National Convention. (Only done during convention years)

fields.name: Dues
fields.description: Semi-annual Dues due

fields.name: Gear Article
fields.description: The Gear is Theta Tau Fraternity's national magazine. As a member of Theta Tau, you are given a lifetime subscription. Therefore, it is every chapter's duty to submit one or more articles to the Editor-in-Chief of the Gear every school term.

fields.name: Hall of Fame
fields.description: Chapters, alumni associations, and the Executive Council may each nominate one or two for this honor each year. Nominations must be sent to the Director of the Alumni HAll of Fame. Those nominated may be living or deceased, from your own chapter or another chapter of the Fraternity, nominated for service to Theta Tau or to their profession (engineering or something else). There may be a maximum of five inductees each year. Alumni previously nominated will remain eligible for five years from the date of their initial nomination.

fields.name: Initiation Report
fields.description: This form reports the initiation of new brothers to the Theta Tau Central Office. Initiation fees and badge costs should be submitted to Theta Tau Central Office in conjunction with this report. This must be done within 2 weeks after initiation or a $25 per initiate late fee will be assessed against the chapter.

fields.name: Insurance Payment
fields.description: Liability Insurance payment due

fields.name: Lock-in
fields.description: Lock-Ins are events utilized by chapters to bring chapter members together to strengthen brotherhood. They are also used for chapter officers and chairmen to sit down and organize/plan for the upcoming semester, such as types of events, event dates, rush/pledging preparation and budgeting.

fields.name: Member Updates
fields.description: Submit Updates to: Membership Status Change Report, Officer Election Report, COOP, etc.

fields.name: Newsletter for Alumni
fields.description: Send an Alumni Newsletter to chapter alumni

fields.name: Outstanding Student Member
fields.description: Yearly, each chapter selects an active member to honor as their chapter's Outstanding Student Member. A form is submitted to the Theta Tau Central Office, indicating the chapter's selection. Each OSM is mailed a certificate and OSM tangle, as well as entered into the consideration for the National OSM Award.

fields.name: Pledge Forms
fields.description: This form is filled out by each pinned pledging member and MUST be done immediately after pinning.

fields.name: Pledge Program
fields.description: Submit Prospective New Member/Pledge Program to Regional Director for review

fields.name: Review Inventory
fields.description:
An inventory comprised of All consumable supplies needed to run a successful chapter. Items such as, but not limited to:
- Membership Manuals
- Prospective New Member/Pledge Pins
- Candles
- Pages for Roll Book
- Prospective New Member/Pledge Education Materials

fields.name: Risk Management Form
fields.description: The Risk Management Form is a form that each chapter's officers must review with their chapter and that chapter officers sign. This is done once per year within two weeks of the beginning of the Fall semester. It is recommended that chapters review the risk management policy once per semester for new members and a review for ongoing members.

fields.name: Scholarship
fields.description: Form submitted by any active student member that applies them to any/All scholarships available through the Theta Tau Educational Foundation.

fields.name: Officer Election Report
fields.description: This form reports elections of new officers once they are installed. It is submitted to Theta Tau Central Office within 2 weeks after the installation of new officers.
